daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: Governor Hochul has updated New Yorkers on state preparations for a massive winter storm, while outreach teams are working to shelter the homeless; meanwhile, flight delays and cancellations have surged, and NYC's new tipping law for delivery services takes effect.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Governor Hochul updates New Yorkers on state preparations ahead of a massive winter storm. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitAFBVV95cUxOXzlrOGZNTlRBVlVOelJNY2VxazdKVzdLVGgwOXFCTzFmWGFQXzljVEhqTThvaEJiVy1PMndtV1ROVXNwS3FGOXJyTUVOT3ZPeGhMSWZkZDU1VHRwZGlUaVoxazdpVXRIaHBZSGNjNTd6bE1xWGpUdGl5cFFwQVVVNlBGb1lJXzZuLTNkWW96SGhGNmhrMEtTNl9vOEtCQmNJWDJ5QkhvTTBTRVVhTDBRVXV5N0s?oc=5)
- Outreach teams are working to shelter the homeless ahead of the weekend snowstorm. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMimgFBVV95cUxNb2ZnMnFxTFJkQnI1MVBISlNSLWRFaXZLRHczQV9iSlg3eGEzU0xLX3pmUzJJdDhZR3U5X1RQQjAtcDA4ZHk1ZHJRTkhhLWxCZTlFS1pKWThUZnFGTE5jSW5DbWJsMkJ0QUttY0RYSG1SSTF2dEdDWnYtUVhiNFFoWGZkRnNYTEVnSUhFOFVQaDJhM3BTM3lrVDlB?oc=5)
- Today's winter storm has caused over 11,500 flight delays and cancellations. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMid0FVX3lxTFBqVjVJRmJzblA4dXlqVzB6TzRUT0xTb1poLTBJNFlpSEptc3R1S19zc2lYVFRfd0ZnYW5STmoxanhpQmw5Z3gwMmJwbFctT09TZlBUZGdZRjdIT1dMcjJ6X3hXTE0tN1paV2ViNHJLNHp0QlFMbzVR?oc=5)
- City suspends Bronx demolition contractor after a building collapse due to safety risks. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqAFBVV95cUxOYlcycWctRllyZGJ4emxNdHd0bmlwSTlJYjNqRGRQTzlTWW5zZEVrb3NjbDdLc1JZc2tHWklzTldpTWVvME14ZlVKazRhWEExLXVZbFZWTFI5bnJDVXE4QnhMczVVbjh6Z0k4RmFiZ1RYeW9yTXl4UFFmY2c4ekN1bXJRTUgxYUNWdkVuRlBLeHZQSlRfdXNhWEltU09mdENCNnRJWWZXTTA?oc=5)
- NYC bridges and tunnels, including a Staten Island crossing, will have lane closures in the coming days. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Water main break on W43rd Street disrupted service, but it has been restored by late afternoon. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMingFBVV95cUxPakFMOGhJd3RSMG1tRURsUlZfd2JSVGVnX2tpcmR3UVZHc1R3c0o4VHMyVUxEcG51M2JpbnkwZjVUWjZVM1ltdUdvX1NySl9Wckhza2FleUtzWW1RdGtGd2VVbmhOZjYzMmF5VFdlM1VDVmVBd2xuR2I5Z05yLTFQZ2VIZENaalJSYnVoeS1ISjA2NTNJYmc5aVU2aVZEUQ?oc=5)

opportunities_welfare.title: Opportunities & Welfare
opportunities_welfare.summary_md:
### Opportunities & Welfare

- The New York Blood Center urgently needs blood donations to meet local demand.
